name: Ainz
text: Ainz Ooal Gown make appearance outside Great Tomb of Nazarick. Death is here. Your enemies tremble in fear.

uniques: [1] free [Ainz Ooal Gown] units appear <in [Capital] cities>

name: CZ2128
text: CZ2128 Delta watch outside sky. Some idiot declare war to her master. This isn't cute at all. Let's erase them all as soon as possible.
